description.description:
Write and test a draw_box() function to display the following.

+------+
-      -
-      -
-      -
+------+

Use a loop to create the repeating three lines i.e. use a loop to write "- -" three times.

examples.Sample code:
def draw_box()
    print("top of the box")

draw_box()

description.title: Draw a Box

expected_elements.hint: Use a for loop to draw the sides of the box.
expected_elements.name: For
